department: Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade And Development
short_summary: Interior fit-up for the Embassy of Canada to Austria, in Vienna
description: His Majesty the King in right of Canada, represented by the Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) has a requirement for interior fit-up for the Embassy of Canada to Austria, in Vienna.
full_summary:
======================================

### Notification of Tender

Canada's [Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD)](https://www.international.gc.ca/) invites bidders to participate in the interior fit-up for the Embassy of Canada to Austria in Vienna.

#### Tender Details

| Field | Value | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| **Reference Number** | CB-8047-6396427 | Tender reference number |
| **Solicitation Number** | 24-244914 | Solicitation number for the tender |
| **Publication Date** | August 11, 2023 | Date of publication for the tender |
| **Tender Closing Date** | August 29, 2023 at 2:00 PM | Date and time for the tender closing |
| **Procurement Method** | Competitive - Open Bidding | Tendering method: competitive, open bidding |
| **Trade Agreements** | Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) | Applicable free trade agreement |

#### Project Details

Canada's [Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD)](https://www.international.gc.ca/) requires a contractor to undertake the interior fit-up for the Embassy of Canada to Austria in Vienna. The scope of work includes:

* Construction of a new doorway
* Installation of a ramp
* Building new partition walls with a controlled access door
* Installation of a new airlock and entrance facility

The project will be conducted in two phases:

1. **Request for Qualification (RFQ)**: Review and evaluation of qualified contractors
2. **Request for Proposal (RFP)**: Shortlisting of contractors based on their qualifications and submission of proposals

| **Expected Contract Start Date** | N/A | Start date for the contract is not yet determined |
| **Expected Contract End Date** | N/A | End date for the contract is not yet determined |
